After 1 or more cards leave your rival's deck during this Enhance Step, this attack gets +2 speed.
Add the top card of your rival's discard pile to the top of their deck.
Seal 2 rival foundations.
After you block with this card, draw 1 card. If the blocked attack had Throw, it deals no damage.
Discard the top 6 cards of your rival's deck.
After this card is discarded due to a rival effect, draw 2 cards.
After your rival plays an ability on a non-character card in their stage, seal all copies of that card in their stage.
If this card is added to your momentum, add it face up.
Draw 1 card, then discard 1 card.
If you have at least 1 momentum, draw 1 card.
After a card leaves your momentum due to a rival effect, draw 1 card and add the top card of your deck to your momentum face up. Playable while committed.
This attack gets -1 speed for each of your momentum.
Your rival destroys 1 face up foundation. Your rival may build the top card of their deck committed.
The next time you destroy a foundation during this attack, build the top card of your deck.
This attack gets +2 damage. Playable while committed.
Your attack with "Hardened" or "Red" in its name gets +1 speed and +1 damage.
After you check this card to play or block with an attack, seal 1 rival foundation and add this card to your hand.
Reveal the top 2 cards of your rivals deck and replace them in any order. If you revealed an attack, this attack gets +2 damage.
After you play this card, look at the top card of your deck.
Reveal the top card of either player's deck.
